knimeNode.name: FileSplitter
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node takes a list of files as input and outputs a split list of three output files plus the rest of the files in the fourth output.

fullDescription.intro: This node takes a list of files as input and outputs a split list of three output files plus the rest of the files in the fourth output. The order corresponds to the order of the input list and ports.

ports.inPort: The list of file(s) that should be split.
ports.outPort: The first file from the input list.
The second file from the input list.
The third file from the input list.
The rest of the files from the input list as an output list.
